snippet.title: Nba Jam Tournament Edition Trailer 1995
snippet.description:
Nba Jam Tournament Edition Trailer 1995

Official Content From Acclaim

Choose 3 players from any NBA team and jam the opposition. Manage playing time carefully to avoid fatigue and injuries. There's even an optional 7 point shot in this exciting, fast paced game!
Platforms: Sega Saturn, Sega Genesis, Super Nintendo, Sony PlayStation

Sega Saturn, Sega Genesis, Super Nintendo, Sony PlayStation
